extendedInfo.description: If you are Avenged Sevenfold's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Avenged Sevenfold's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Avenged Sevenfold's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Avenged Sevenfold's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Sounding the Seventh Trumpet- Waking the Fallen- City of Evil- Avenged Sevenfold- Diamonds In The Rough- Nightmare--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- A Little Piece Of Heaven- Afterlife- Afterlife (Alternate Version)- Almost Easy- Almost Easy (CLA Mix)- An Epic Of Time Wasted- And All Things Will End- Bat Country- Beast And The Harlot- Betrayed- Blinded In Chains- Breaking Their Hold- Brompton Cocktail- Buried Alive- Burn It Down- Chapter Four- Clairvoyant Disease- Critical Acclaim- Crossroads- Dancing Dead- Danger Line- Darkness Surrounding- Dear God- Demons- Desecrate Through Reverance- Eternal Rest- Fiction- Flash Of The Blade- Forgotten Faces- Girl I Know- God Hates Us- Gunslinger- I Won't See You Tonight (Part 1)- I Won't See You Tonight (Part 2)- Lips Of Deceit- Lost- Lost It All- M.I.A.- Natural Born Killer- Nightmare- Radiant Eclipse- Remenissions- Save Me- Scream- Second Heartbeat- Seize The Day- Shattered By Broken Dreams- Sidewinder- So Far Away- Streets- Strength Of The World- Tension- The Art Of Subconscious Illusion- The Fight- The Wicked End- Thick And Thin- To End The Rapture- Tonight The World Dies- Trashed And Scattered- Turn The Other Way- Unbound (The Wild Ride)- Unholy Confessions- Until The End- Victim- Waking The Fallen- Walk- Warmness On The Soul- We Come Out At Night- Welcome To The Family

reviews.title: Hail To The King Lyrics
reviews.comment: Great app but please update so I can learn their new songs from Hail To The King.
reviews.author: Neff Salas

reviews.title: Excellent. Please do a update
reviews.comment: Please do a update of an album called Hail to the King.
reviews.author: Andy Green

reviews.title: New album please..
reviews.comment: Will be 5 star when Hail To The King album added..need to learn their  new song now.. -A7Xmalaysia-
reviews.author: Zacky VengeanceIIV

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: A7X rocks and this app is good for learning all of their lyrics
reviews.author: Ezio Auditori

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love A7X since they were underground trying to get signed way back when and this makes it easier to get lyrics to my favorite songs
reviews.author: Michele miezulnop\310\233ii

reviews.title: YES.
reviews.comment: So.. I f\303\274cking love you.  Thank you so much! <3
